description: It's about TIME! Join your favourite Super Heroes and Super Villains from different eras and realities as they go head-to-head with the time-travelling Kang the Conqueror in the all-new, original adventure, LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2! Play as the Guardians of the Galaxy, Spider-Man, Thor, Hulk, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, Doctor Strange, Green Goblin and dozens of other Marvel Super Heroes and Villains in this cosmic battle across the time-tossed city of Chronopolis! Travel across lands – from Ancient Egypt to The Old West, Sakaar and New York City in 2099 – and transport objects or characters through the centuries! And, with new battle modes, friends and family can play against each other in a series of themed challenges and battle arenas!
name: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2
